(disclaimers)[1]

If A Bridge Collapses - Sue

Engineers can be sued if their design fails.

Contractor Forgot To Put A Lock on Your Front Door - Sue

You live in a city and hire a contractor to renovate / build your house.


The contractor "forgot" to put a lock on your front door.


Sue the contractor.


Refunds For Buggy Software

Demand a refund if you are sold buggy software.

CI/CD

CI/CD is an acknowledgement that software is buggy and needs to be frequently fixed.


This is a tell.
